qas.question: What type of worldview did New York's no wave movement tend to have?
The Contortions, Teenage Jesus and the Jerks were all musicians part of what movement?
Who produced the compilation "No New York"?
What no wave-affiliated label was founded in 1978?
In addition to non-rock styles, what did some of the no-wave groups experiment with sonically?

answers.text: a short-lived art and music scene that began in part as a reaction against punk's recycling of traditionalist rock tropes

qas.question: What type of a view did no wave have?
What types of musicians were the Contortions, Teenage Jesus and the Jerks, Mars, DNA, Theoretical Girls and Rhys Chatham?
What was considered the true portrait of the no wave movement?

plausible_answers.text: the Contortions, Teenage Jesus and the Jerks, Mars, DNA, Theoretical Girls and Rhys Chatham

qas.question: In what year did ZE Records end production?
What states were considered the least influential for the no wave movement?

plausible_answers.text: the Contortions, Teenage Jesus and the Jerks, Mars, DNA, Theoretical Girls and Rhys Chatham

qas.question: What musicians refused to experiment with their style?

context: Also emerging during this period was <b12_0>New York<b12_0/>'s no wave movement, <a5_0>a short-lived art and music scene that began in part as a reaction against punk's recycling of traditionalist rock tropes<a5_0/> and often reflected <a6_0>an abrasive, confrontational and <a0_0>nihilistic<a6_0/><a0_0/> worldview. <a1_0><a7_0>No wave<a7_0/><a1_0/> musicians such as <b10_0><b13_0>the Contortions, Teenage Jesus and the Jerks, Mars, DNA, Theoretical Girls and Rhys Chatham<b13_0/><b10_0/> instead experimented with <a4_0>noise, dissonance and atonality<a4_0/> in addition to non-rock styles. The former four groups were included on the <a2_0>Eno<a2_0/>-produced <a9_0>No New York<a9_0/> compilation, often considered the quintessential testament to the scene. The no wave-affiliated label <a3_0>ZE Records<a3_0/> was founded in <a8_0><b11_0>1978<b11_0/><a8_0/>, and would also produce acclaimed and influential compilations in subsequent years.
